content.question: If <math alttext="the integral from, negative 1 to 1, of, f of x, d x, equals 7 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> and <math alttext="the integral from, negative 1 to 1, of, g of, x, d x, equals, negative 9 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the integral from, negative 1 to 1, of, open parenthesis, 2 times, f of x, minus, g of x, close parenthesis, d x, equals " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
